message: Let's split the money 90-10, a fair start to the game!
Let's reverse the roles and see how you like a 90-10 split. Remember, the money is worth less with each round!
You're not getting off that easy! I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
I'm willing to be generous this time, but I'm starting to see a pattern here.  Let's find a more equitable split before the value of the money plummets even further.
You're not being very creative with your offers, Bob. I'm trying to find a middle ground here.
Let's keep the trend going! I think this is a fair offer, considering the value of the money is declining rapidly.  Let's end this game before we both lose everything.
I'm not falling for the same trick twice, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.

Alice, you're making this harder than it needs to be. Let's meet in the middle and split this money fairly before it's worth nothing.  Accept this offer and we can both walk away with a decent amount.
I'm not getting any more generous, Bob. You're going to have to make a real offer if you want to get out of this game.
Alice, the money is losing value rapidly.  This is our last chance to get a decent share.  Accept this offer and we both walk away with something.
